MS MCQs

    Introduction to modern management in Microsoft 365 - Summary and knowledge check

    »

    1. Modern management is similar to which of the following management concepts?

      How devices are physically delivered through the modern supply chain.

      How user accounts are managed with Azure Active Directory (AAD).

      How mobile devices are managed by Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM).

      How security is managed by Enterprise Mobility + Security (EMS).


    2. Which of the following lists the key pillars of modern management?

      Easy to deploy, Intelligent security, rapid incident response

      Easy to deploy, proactive insights, closely managed

      Always up-to-date, Intelligent security, proactive insights

      Always up-to-date, Intelligent security, rapid incident response


    3. Which of the following enables you to create self-contained provisioning packages?

      Windows Configuration Designer

      Group Policy

      Microsoft Intune

      Microsoft Autopilot


    4. Which of the following enables you to avoid reimaging with cloud-based device management services?

      Microsoft Intune

      Windows Configuration Designer

      Microsoft Autopilot

      System Center Configuration Manager
